Package Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChesstoryConstants
    Contains all the constants we use ! (Themes, font_size, texts, etc)
    ChesstoryGame
    Manages all the graphic elements and actions in-game (but not the chess board itself), including themes, logs displayer, rules displayer, time travel, etc.
    GameSave
    Contains what is needed to load and save a chess game.
    Main  
    MainExe
    The Main of this project, it starts the program !
    MainMenu
    The first menu of the game ; It permits the user to choose the game he wants to play, etc.
    Music
    Handles playing, stoping, and looping of sounds for the game.
    RulesEditor
    Manages everything needed to custom chess pieces.
